WorkOrderFeed.description: Feed updates and service notes from work order actions

EmailMessage.description: Email correspondence related to the case

Case.Subject: [Critical] HPE ProLiant DL380 Gen10 - Memory Health Degraded
Case.Description: Server experiencing memory errors and system instability due to faulty DIMM module in Processor 1 Slot 8. iLO showing repeated memory errors and health status degraded.
Case.Resolution__c: Engineer visited site and replaced faulty DIMM module. System tested and confirmed stable.
Case.GSD_Environment_Plain_Text__c: Model: DL380 Gen10, OS: VMware ESXi 7.0, RAM: 128GB
Case.Resolution_Plain_Text__c: Engineer visited the site and replaced the faulty DIMM module in Processor 1 Slot 8. System tested and confirmed working fine after replacement.

Task.Description: Issue description: Server Memory Health Degraded. Part needed: Yes - Part Number 815098-B21 (16GB DDR4 DIMM). Schedule onsite visit for replacement.
Verified memory errors in iLO logs. Ran memory diagnostics confirming Processor 1 Slot 8 failure. Part ordered for replacement.

WorkOrder.Subject: DIMM Replacement - DL380 Gen10
WorkOrder.Description: Replace faulty DIMM in Processor 1 Slot 8. Part: 815098-B21. Onsite work completed. System tested OK.

CaseComments.CommentBody: Engineer confirmed on site. Working on DIMM replacement. Replaced faulty module and running diagnostics.
Replacement complete. System running stable. Memory tests passed. Customer confirmed satisfaction.

WorkOrderFeed.Body: Engineer dispatched to customer site. ETA 2 hours.
Onsite work completed. DIMM replaced. System health restored. Parts used: 815098-B21 x1.

EmailMessage.Subject: Re: Memory Error - DL380 Gen10
EmailMessage.TextBody: Thank you for reporting. We have scheduled an engineer for tomorrow morning to replace the faulty DIMM module. You will receive confirmation once completed.

EmailMessage.Subject: Case Resolved - Memory Issue Fixed
EmailMessage.TextBody: Your case has been resolved. The faulty DIMM module was replaced and the system is now operating normally. Please let us know if you experience any further issues.
